name: reverseArray
description: Write a function to reverse an array without using built-in reverse methods
pyTemplate:
def reverse_array(arr):

    # Do not modify the original array
    # Don't use built-in methods like reverse() or slicing with [::-1]
    pass
pyTest:
def test_reverse_array(self):
        original = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
        result = reverse_array(original)
        
        self.assertEqual(result, [5, 4, 3, 2, 1])
        self.assertEqual(original, [1, 2, 3, 4, 5])  # Original should be unchanged
        
        self.assertEqual(reverse_array([]), [])
        self.assertEqual(reverse_array([1]), [1])
